task: Download a copy of a document
steps: Click on the 'File' tab in the top left corner of the window.
Navigate to the location where the document is stored.
Select the document you want to download a copy of.
Select 'Save As' from the dropdown menu.
Choose a location on your computer to save the copy of the document.
Enter a name for the copy of the document.
name: Download_a_copy_of_a_document
